doc.name: wslabel
doc.synopsis: Creating a label for an input field
doc.description:
Labels are used to describe an input field. With CSS they can be styled to fit your needs.

To 'Assign' a label to a specific input field, use the 'for' argument. The example below illustrates this.
doc.parameters:
wslabel
Can hold classes, a for argument, styles and more
doc.example:
<wslabel for="uname">Username"</wslabel>

Then you have an input field in the form (useally right after the label) with an ID of 'uname'. e.g.

<wsfield id="uname" name="username" type="text" />
